name: SNOWRIFTERS
description:
SNOWRIFTERS is a videogame about a futuristic high speed race / battle with visionary vehicles in snow and ice.
It is settled in the near, realistic, utopic future.
You are the pilot of a so called Snowrifter, a vehicle designed to move fast through snow and on ice.
There are different Teams and Rifters. Each one‘s got it pros and cons. You have two types of surfaces, snow and ice. The Rifters have different modes for the specific surface, which you have to activate in the right moment to transform.
The game takes place in four different Areas (Russia/Greenland/ Switzerland/Canada).
Every area has four racetracks and is one big battle-arena. To make it more exciting, every vehicle has a shield, a turbo and six kinds of items that cost your enemy energy and / or slow him down.
HF GL
